solution.title: Urban Secure Analytics Case Study
solution.overview: This solution for Newport Police Department integrates data from disparate legacy systems into a unified, highly secure analytics platform. It leverages a scalable data integration pipeline, custom Python analytics, ArcGIS geospatial mapping, interactive web‐based dashboards, and secure AWS cloud hosting to deliver real‑time, actionable insights that improve operational decision‑making and efficiency.

components.name: Data Integration Pipeline
components.description: A scalable pipeline developed to consolidate data from cloud services, databases, and legacy systems using both real‑time ingestion and scheduled batch processing.

components.name: AWS Cloud Hosting & Compliance
components.description: Leverages AWS infrastructure to provide high scalability and performance, while ensuring CJIS compliance and data encryption standards.

components.name: Advanced Analytics & Automation
components.description: Utilizes Python scripting to automate manual data processing, implement machine learning models, and perform statistical analysis for enhanced data reliability.

components.name: Geospatial Analysis
components.description: Integrates ArcGIS to provide precise geospatial mapping and interactive location-based insights for improved geographic decision-making.

components.name: Interactive Web-Based Dashboards
components.description: Developed with HTML5 and JavaScript frameworks, these dashboards deliver dynamic, real-time insights with interactive drill-down capabilities.

components.name: Stakeholder Engagement
components.description: Ensures close coordination with Newport Police Department stakeholders for seamless integration of the system into existing operational workflows.

groups.name: Data Processing & Analytics
